title: Twelve South HiRise 3 Deluxe, Compact Luxury Wireless Magsafe Charging Stand for iPhone, AirPods and Apple Watch - Includes US Power Supply with 5 Foot Cord, Plus International Plug Adapters, Black
description: 3-in-1 Wireless Charging Station - Charge your iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods simultaneously with the Twelve South HiRise 3 Deluxe. This space-saving solution eliminates the need for multiple cords and keeps your nightstand or desk organized. Space-saving vertical design has a footprint smaller than an iPhone Pro Max - perfect for compact bedside tables, nightstands and desks.

The only way the phone charger will magnetically hold the phone in place is if you take the protective cover off the phone. The whole idea of the magnetic charger is to make it easier to charge the phone. It's easier to plug in the charger that came with the phone than taking off the protective cover every time. If I hold the phone in place, it does charge. If I let go of the phone, it slips off.
